duasList.name: When you wake up
duasList.dua: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duasList.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee ahyana baAAda ma amatana wa-ilayhin-nushoor
duasList.translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection

duasList.name: Before sleeping
duasList.translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die

duasList.name: Before entering toilet
duasList.dua: اللَّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعُـوذُ بِـكَ مِـنَ الْخُـبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duasList.transliteration: allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba-ith
duasList.translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.

duasList.name: When starting ablution
duasList.translation: In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful
